caption.p: ( a) Asymmetric unit of PROG-DHB. ( b) Hydrogen-bonded pattern of PROG-DHB. ( c) C-H···π interactions (blue dashed line) in PROG-DHB. ( d) Packing diagram of PROG-DHB along the axis. The ellipsoids are drawn with 30% probability and all hydrogen bonds are represented with dotted lines. Symmetry codes: A: 1/2 + X, 3/2 − Y, 1 − Z; B: 1/2 + X, 3/2 − Y, 1 − Z; C: +X, +Y, 1 + Z; D: −1/2 + X, 3/2 − Y, 1 − Z.
